2019.context: Chewy, Inc. is a online pet products retailer focused on pet food, supplies, pharmacy, and healthcare services. IPO at $8.7B valuation. Autoship subscription model success.

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: Largest online retailer expanding pet category

competitors.name: PetSmart
competitors.notes: Parent company with brick-and-mortar stores

competitors.name: Petco
competitors.notes: Pet specialty retailer with e-commerce

competitors.name: Walmart
competitors.notes: Mass retailer with large pet section online and in-store

competitors.name: Target
competitors.notes: Mass retailer with pet products

competitors.name: 1-800-PetMeds
competitors.notes: Online pet pharmacy

competitors.name: BarkBox
competitors.notes: Pet subscription box service

competitors.name: Costco
competitors.notes: Warehouse club with pet food selection

2024.context: Chewy, Inc. is a online pet products retailer focused on pet food, supplies, pharmacy, and healthcare services. Pet pharmacy and telehealth expansion. Competing with Amazon and Petco.

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: Dominant e-commerce with aggressive pet category growth

competitors.name: Walmart
competitors.notes: Largest US retailer with online and in-store pet products

competitors.name: Petco
competitors.notes: Pet specialty retailer with health services

competitors.name: PetSmart
competitors.notes: Largest specialty pet retailer by stores

competitors.name: Costco
competitors.notes: Warehouse club with value pet products

competitors.name: Target
competitors.notes: Mass retailer with same-day pet delivery

competitors.name: Farmer's Dog
competitors.notes: Fresh pet food subscription competitor

competitors.name: BarkBox
competitors.notes: Pet products and subscription service

2025.context: Chewy, Inc. is a online pet products retailer focused on pet food, supplies, pharmacy, and healthcare services. Pet healthcare ecosystem. Subscription services and personalization.

competitors.notes: Largest e-commerce with significant pet category share
